item.title: You Won't Believe How Easy it is to Keep Your iPhone 6s Plus Battery Going All Day!
item.description: Introduction The iPhone 6s Plus is the latest and greatest from Apple, and it’s packed with features and capabilities. But with all these features come some drawbacks, including a shorter battery life. Fortunately, there are some simple steps you can take to make sure your iPhone 6s Plus battery lasts all day. In this blog post, we’ll discuss the benefits of maintaining a full battery charge, as well as some tips to maximize battery life.
